# isReadable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you can extract the asset’s media data using an asset reader.

## Declaration

```swift
var isReadable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you can use [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReader] to extract the asset’s media data.
title: isReadable
